document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff448c">dreaded </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">first </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b454ff">Robin, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">so, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">He </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94b8f8">mastered, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">now, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I'm </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">some </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#08ffb8">accustomed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Him </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff903c">grown, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">He </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">hurts </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">little, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">though </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff903c">thought </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">if </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">could </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">only </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">live </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Till </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">first </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff448c">Shout </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">got </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">by </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">all </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">Pianos </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0c4b4">Woods </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Had </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0e464">power </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c8b4f0">mangle </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">dared </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b454ff">meet </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff448c">Daffodils </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">For </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff448c">fear </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">their </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0d4a0">Yellow </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">Gown </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Would </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b454ff">pierce </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">fashion </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">So </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">foreign </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">own </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff448c">wished </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff903c">Grass </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">would </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">hurry </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">So </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">when </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">'twas </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff448c">time </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">see </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">He'd </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">too </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b454ff">tall, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b454ff">tallest </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">one </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Could </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">stretch </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">look </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">at </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">could </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b454ff">bear </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">Bees </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">should </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">come, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff448c">wished </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">they'd </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b46090">stay </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">away </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">In </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">those </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b46090">dim </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94b8f8">countries </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">where </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">they </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">go, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">What </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#08ffb8">word </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">had </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">they, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">They're </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">here, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">though; </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffc04e">creature </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b454ff">failed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">No </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b46090">Blossom </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff448c">stayed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">away </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">In </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b46090">gentle </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff903c">deference </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0e464">Queen </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff448c">Calvary </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Each </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">one </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">salutes </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">he </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">goes, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">childish </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">Plumes, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">Lift, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff448c">bereaved </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7078ff">acknowledgement </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">their </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#08ffb8">unthinking </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff448c">Drums </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: I dreaded that first robin so
